input.sentences: today we went to a pc gaming convention .
there where lots of booths there .
we also saw lots of laptops .

output.sentences: Our story begins at the Blizzard PC Gaming convention.
Sam looked at lots of booths and grabbed as many informational flyers as possible.
He checked out lots of desktop computers to see how the specs compared to his own.
There were also lots of laptops with cool designs and features that he wanted.
He had a great time and lots of fun.
